net.parallaxed.bluejam.exceptions
Class ValidationException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          net.parallaxed.bluejam.exceptions.ValidationException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
NullNoteException
public class ValidationException
extends java.lang.Exception

Thrown when an exception occurs in validation. This class can internally store two separate exceptions to describe the nature of the exception that occurred. These can be inspected at runtime to ascertain a course of action.

Author:
Ciarán Rowe (csr2@kent.ac.uk)
See Also:
RhythmException, PitchException, Serialized Form
